org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds

Class AosTransferFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds.AbstractTransferFrame
      • org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds.AosTransferFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransferFrame

    public class AosTransferFrame
extends AbstractTransferFrame
    AOS Transfer Frame as per CCSDS RECOMMENDED STANDARD FOR AOS SPACE DATA LINK PROTOCOL CCSDS 732.0-B-3 September 2015 Primary Header is composed of
    • Transfer frame version number (2 bits) - shall be set to 01
    • Spacecraft id (8 bits)
    • Virtual Channel id (6 bits)
    • Virtual Channel frame count (24 bits)
    • replay flag (1 bit)
    • VC frame count usage flag (1 bit)
    • spare (2 bits)
    • VC frame count cycle
    • frame header error control (optional)
